refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_new ()
refsect2.para: Allocates memory for a new GokFeedback and initializes its attributes to default values. Please free the returned GokFeedback using gok_feedback_free.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to a new GokFeedback.

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees a GokFeedback and associated resources.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the feedback that will be freed.

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_open ()
refsect2.para: Initializes the gok feedbacks and reads them from GConf.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if the feedbacks were initialized, FALSE if not.

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_close ()
refsect2.para: Closes the gok feedbacks and saves them in GConf.

listitem.simpara: A pointer to the first feedback in the list of feedbacks.

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_find_feedback ()
refsect2.para: Finds the feedback from within our list of feedbacks.

listitem.simpara: Name of the feedback you're trying to find.
This should be set TRUE if you are passing in the display name of the feedback. It should be set FALSE if passing in the actual name of the feedback.
A pointer to the feedback, NULL if not found.

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_add_feedback ()
refsect2.para: Adds a new feedback to our list of feedbacks.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to an feedback that gets added to our list of feedbacks.

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_delete_feedback ()
refsect2.para: Deletes the given feedback and unhooks it from our list of feedbacks.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the feedback that will be deleted.

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_backup ()
refsect2.para: Creates a copy of all the data stored on the feedback.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the feedback that will be backed up.

refsect2.title: gok_feedback_revert ()
refsect2.para: Moves the backup data to the current data on the feedback.

listitem.simpara: Pointer to the feedback that will be reverted.
TRUE if any of the reverted settings are different from the current settings. Returns FALSE if the reverted settings are the same as the current settings.
